p: A Principal Component Analysis (PCA) was run with the aim to reduce the number of variables for data modeling, in particular to reduce multicollinearity existing among the bioclimatic indices (see Table 1), and to understand how and which climatic parameters affect grape quality, providing an intrinsic (re)classification of harvest time. Statistical analysis was developed using R packageâ€”release 3.5.2 ( http://www.R-project.org/).
